html: (2 Nephi 8:25; 3 Nephi 20:37; Moroni 10:31)."Shake thyself [arise] from the dust." The footnote reference suggests that this means to "arise from the dust and sit down in dignity, being redeemed at last." (LDSKJ, Isaiah 52:2, footnote b.) The dirt that has been kicked upon you in the past need no longer remain. You will no longer be oppressed and maligned!
